author: nc1234
content: I think Lighthouse is not voting correctly. eg. https://dora.mekong.ethpandaops.io/slot/18136 you can see majority of the 0s in the attestation is from LH

content: Yup, some lh nodes are stuck too

author: parithosh
content: Full resync fixes them. I did that for a few to get participation up. But the others are left alone for debugging.

author: parithosh

author: somnergy
content: Please refresh, has more updates in general + some 7702 fixes

author: yperbasis
content: After https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8929 an EIP-7702 transaction is no longer valid when in its authorization chain_id doesn't fit uint64 or y_parity doesn't fit uint8. Are there any tests for such invalid transactions?

author: pawandhananjay
content: latest commit should fix it, i haven't tested it but should work most likely. If possible, please do a genesis sync instead of checkpoint
